channel.title: Clint Hocking Departs VALVe
channel.description:
Possibly another blow to HL3 development? Maybe he couldn't handle the "loosey-goosey work on what you want" structure at VALVe? Maybe he finished what he was hired to do?
[url='https://www.gameinformer.com/b/news/archive/2014/01/05/clint-hocking-departs-valve.aspx']https://www.gameinformer.com/b/news/archive/2014/01/05/clint-hocking-departs-valve.aspx[/url]

item.title: Clint Hocking Departs VALVe
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Wonder if Freeman will have a single thing to say at the end of the Half-Life series. He has Alyx at his side, cock his shotgun and says, in a nasally nerdy voice, “Groovy.”

Read full topic

item.title: Clint Hocking Departs VALVe
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Maybe he was hired to do the voice acting for Gordon Freeman…

He already recorded all his lines. :lol:

item.title: Clint Hocking Departs VALVe
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Why would it be a blow to hl3 development? I did a quick search and it seems he wasn’t involved in anything important/half life related, while working at Valve.
